mapper.insert: insert into Dict(dict_word, dict_mean, file_no, sf9_no) value(#{dict_word}, #{dict_mean}, #{file_no}, #{sf9_no})
mapper.select: select dict_no, dict_word, dict_mean, file_no, sf9_no from Dict
select dict_no, dict_word, dict_mean, file_no, sf9_no from Dict where sf9_no = #{sf9_no}
select dict_no, dict_word, dict_mean, file_no, sf9_no from Dict where dict_word = #{dict_word}
